sourcesContent:
import { UserService } from './../../services/user.service'; import { AuthService } from './../../services/auth.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserStoreService } from 'src/app/services/user-store.service'; import { forkJoin } from 'rxjs'; import { User } from 'src/app/models/user.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { fullName!: string; users!: User[]; status = false; constructor(public userStore: UserStoreService, public auth: AuthService, private userService: UserService) { } ngOnInit() { this.userStore.getFullName() .subscribe(res=>{ let value = this.auth.getFullNameFromToken(); this.fullName = res || value; }) this.getUsers(); } logOut(){ this.auth.signOut(); } loadFullName(){ } getUsers(){ this.userService.getAllUsers() .subscribe({ next:(res=>{ this.users = res }) }) } addToggle() { this.status = !this.status; } }
